General.Name: Digitalist Group Oyj
General.Description: Digitalist Group Plc, a technology company, provides digital solutions and services in Finland, Sweden, North America, and internationally. It offers design services, including digital, mobile, and web design, as well as service and industrial design; and planning strategy, user research, visuals and interaction designing, prototype designing, and usability study services. The company also provides branding services that develops customers' brands, marketing, and customer experiences; and consultancy services. In addition, it offers software solutions for hardware, and embedded systems and software; LeanLab, an interactive platform that allows to engage directly and build understanding of customer's needs; Drupal, a digital service for open-source environments; and Digitalist Network, a community that shares insights, opinions, and passion for future. The company was formerly known as Ixonos plc and changed its name to Digitalist Group Plc in May 2017. Digitalist Group Plc was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
